start-msg:
Welcome to Flashcards Bot!

I'm here to help you learn effectively using the spaced repetition method. This method is based on a simple idea: the closer to the moment of forgetting, the better you remember information.

ðŸ”— How to get started:
1. Add a new flashcard using the 'Add Card' command.  
2. I'll calculate when you need to review the flashcard; all you have to do is press 'Review'

ðŸ’¬ At any time, you can press the 'Help' button to get a detailed description of all functions. By clicking on 'Settings' you can edit your cards or customize reminders.

Good luck with your studies!
settings-msg: You have opened the settings. Please select an action:
add-card-msg:
Great! Let's start adding a new flashcard.

1. Send me the text for the front side of the flashcard.
2. After that, I'll ask you to provide text for the back side.  
3. Done! The flashcard has been added and will be used in the learning process.  

Looking forward to your flashcard!

P.S. If at any point you change your mind and want to abort the process, please go through all the steps to the end and then delete the flashcard.
add-card-back-msg: Good, now send the back side:
add-card-is-saved-msg: The card has been successfully added and will be shown in the next review, happy learning.
send-list-msg:
Under this message, there is a list of your flashcards.

1st column - card id
2nd column - front side
3rd column - back side
4th column - date of the next review

P.S. If the review date is reset, it means the card is hidden. You can change it by pressing the 'Edit card' button in the 'Settings' menu.
